prompt: A circle changing colors from blue to red to green
generated_code:
from manim import *

class ColorChangingCircle(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Create a circle with an initial blue color
        circle = Circle(radius=2, color=BLUE)
        
        # Add the circle to the scene
        self.play(Create(circle), run_time=2)
        
        # Change the color of the circle to red
        self.play(circle.animate.set_color(RED), run_time=10)
        
        # Change the color of the circle to green
        self.play(circle.animate.set_color(GREEN), run_time=10)
        
        # Pause for a moment at the end
        self.wait(8)
